channel.title: [PI] Can't teleport in certain places [Rep++]
channel.description:
How can make certain places you can't teleport at, for example your in varrock and you click teleport home, but it says 'you cannot teleport'.
Rep ++ for solution

item.title: [PI] Can't teleport in certain places [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @BlessedCity BlessedCity
item.description:
@BlessedCity wrote:

[quote=“hawkgames, post:6, topic:398707”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=495845.msg3625413#msg3625413 date=1307804085]
protip: check out Nividia dungeoneering the answer is in there young grasshopper.
[/quote]

I’ll go check it.

Well it must be something like this:

	if(c.Varrock) {
		c.sendMessage("You cannot teleport out of here.");
		return;
	}

I was using Varrock for an example.[/quote]
This was an example 2 but W/E
Tell me when it worked okay? Or if you got any other questions.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Can't teleport in certain places [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

Look for “you can not teleport blah blah blah” in your source and remove it…?, or if ur saying u want to make place not accessable you just block it off… if its in the teleport book you look up the coords it teleports you too and you delete the statment.

Read full topic
